name: Selenite  Crystal Charging Plates
description:
Selenite Charging Plates are a great way to recharge your crystals, smudges, jewelry, bracelets and etc.
You might see minor imperfections as this is a natural selenite stone.
Each charging plate is approximately 8x4" roughly 2 Lb's +. Stones, sage, bracelets are not included.
Made in Morocco.
Please note: These are natural products hand carved  - scratches, scrapes are normal & not considered defects.


The price is for a selenite charging plate only.
